name: bad driving simulator
description:
Install instructions

1.  Download The Zip File

2. Extract The Zip By Right Clicking The File And Clicking Extract All (Or You Can Use A 3rd Party App Like 7-Zip or WinRAR But I wont Tell You How To Use Those)

3. Press Extract

4.  Double-Click The File bad driving simulator Twice

5. Double-Click winExe

6. Find The File Untitled.exe And Double-Click It
